en-US.summary: Prove you're not a mouthbreather with your Stranger Things knowledge.
examplePhrases: Alexa tell Stranger Things Trivia to start a game
Alexa tell Stranger Things Trivia I want to play
en-US.name: Stranger Things Trivia
en-US.description: Do you believe you're a Stranger Things expert? See if you've got what it takes to join the party and defeat the evil of the upsidedown.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This was built using the Trivia Sample.
